jobDescription: Data Entry Associate I | San Jose, CATitle: Data Entry Associate I Function To enter data from various source documents into the computer system for storage, processing and data management purposes. Reports to: Customer Support Operations Supervisor Essential Duties and Responsibilities:Daily extracting completed sales orders from CRM into Accounting Software, MAS500.Verify accuracy of Sales Order in Sales Toolbox to sales order in Accounting Software ensuring accuracy in resulting pick list.Forward Pick List to Shipping Department for fulfilling the orders.Open cases on Dashboard to obtain further information for incomplete documents.Scan documents into document management systems or databasesRespond to requests for information from internal and external customers.Update Customer information in MAS 500.Comply with data integrity and security policies.Physical and Environmental Conditions:Sitting using a computer consumes 80% of each day. Walking to different locations within the office will be necessary.Minimum Qualification and Experience:2-3 years related experience. High school diploma, general education degree or equivalent.Proficiency in the use of software applications, databases, spreadsheets, word processing required. Knowledge of MAS 500 a plus.Detail oriented and the ability to work accurately is essential.Interpersonal skills-ability to work in a Team Environment.Excellent communication skills - verbal and written.Excellent problem analysis and problem-solving.Attention to detail and accuracy.Adaptability/initiative. Are you ready for a career in the skin care industry? Start here and apply today: h.r@janmarini.com. An HR representative will reach out to you directly.
